name: Eros Myth
description:
Aphrodite is displeased with you, her cherub minions. She urges you both to go forth and pierce the hearts of as many folk as you can, bringing more love to the world and more worshippers to her altar...

Credits
Rajnesh Jindel
Jacqueline Fromme
Josh Grafton
Michail Isaakidis
Kieran Hogben
